Apheresis begin ANC > 1.0 x 109/L continue > 2.0 x 106 CD34+ cells/kg patient weight cryopreserved . A 10-15 liter apheresis perform unless stop earlier clinical judgment toxicity ( e.g. , numbness , tetany ) . A maximum four apheresis perform . Conditioning regimen Cyclophosphamide 50 mg/kg/day give IV 1 hour 250 cc normal saline day -5 , -4 , -3 , -2 . If actual weight < ideal weight , cyclophosphamide give base actual weight . If actual weight > ideal weight , cyclophosphamide give adjusted ideal weight . Adjusted ideal weight = ideal weight + 40 % x actual weight minus ideal weight . Mesna 50mg/kg/day give IV 24 hour 250 cc normal saline D5W . Weight base calculate cyclophosphamide . ATG ( rabbit ) 0.5 mg/kg day -5 ; 1mg/kg day -4 -3 ; 1.5 mg/kg day -2 -1 ( total 5.5mg/kg , dose adjustment ) give IV 10 hour 250 cc normal saline begin least 1 hour infusion cyclophosphamide . Premedicate acetaminophen 650 mg po diphenhydramine 25 mg po/IV 30 minute infusion . An in-line 0.22 µm filter use ATG administration . Methylprednisolone A suggest dose 250mg IV administer 30 minute ATG infusion . Hydration A suggested rate 125 cc/hr NS give start 6 hour cyclophosphamide continue 24 hour last cyclophosphamide dose.The rate hydration aggressively adjust order avoid fluid overload . BID weight obtain . Amount fluid modify base patient 's fluid status . Minimum target urine output 2 liters/m2/day G-CSF 5 mcg/kg/day SQ continue absolute neutrophil count reach least 500/µl .
